name: ST slider
author: Sumit Tiwari

sections.description: ST Slider is very simple and low weight slide show plugin which helps WordPress/dashboard user to create Slide Show on page by using shortcode i.e. [st_slider]
sections.installation:
• Download the plugin .zip file.
  • Login in to admin Click Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  • Find ST Slider in plugin list and activate it.
  • After activate plugin you will see ST Slider menu at left side on WordPress dashboard.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Download the plugin .zip file.
  • Login in to admin Click Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  • Find ST Slider in plugin list and activate it.
  • After activate plugin you will see ST Slider menu at left side on WordPress dashboard.
